00029 #ifndef CARDIACSIMULATIONARCHIVER_HPP_
00030 #define CARDIACSIMULATIONARCHIVER_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include <string>
00033 
00034 #include "FileFinder.hpp"
00035 
00036 /*
00037  * Archiving extravaganza:
00038  *
00039  * Various objects are archived through a pointer to an abstract class.  All the potential concrete
00040  * classes need to be included here, so they are registered with Boost.  If not, Boost (<1.37) won't be
00041  * able to find the archiving methods of the concrete class and will throw the following
00042  * exception:
00043  *
00044  *       terminate called after throwing an instance of 'boost::archive::archive_exception'
00045  *       what():  unregistered class
00046  *
00047  * No member variable is defined to be of any of these clases, so removing them won't
00048  * produce any compiler error.  The exception above will occur at runtime.
00049  *
00050  * This might not be even necessary in certain cases, if the file is included implicitly by another
00051  * header file or by the test itself.  It's safer though.
00052  */
00053 #include "MonodomainProblem.hpp"
00054 #include "BidomainProblem.hpp"
00055 #include "BidomainWithBathProblem.hpp"
00056 #include "HeartConfigRelatedCellFactory.hpp"
00057 
00065 template<class PROBLEM_CLASS>
00066 class CardiacSimulationArchiver
00067 {
00068 public:
00079     static void Save(PROBLEM_CLASS& rSimulationToArchive, const std::string& rDirectory, bool clearDirectory=true);
00080 
00081 
00093     static PROBLEM_CLASS* Load(const std::string& rDirectory);
00094 
00105     static PROBLEM_CLASS* Load(const FileFinder& rDirectory);
00106 
00123     static PROBLEM_CLASS* Migrate(const FileFinder& rDirectory);
00124 };
00125 
00126 #endif /*CARDIACSIMULATIONARCHIVER_HPP_*/
